snippet.title: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree | Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
In the Land of Shadow, Miquella awaits the return of his promised Lord.
 
Pre-order ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree: https://bnent.eu/EldenRing-SOTE
 
The Land of Shadow.
 
A place obscured by the Erdtree.
Where the goddess Marika first set foot.
 
A land purged in an unsung battle.
Set ablaze by Messmer’s flame.
 
It was to this land that Miquella departed.
Divesting himself of his flesh, his strength, his lineage.
Of all things Golden.

Follow us on:
Web: https://www.eldenring.com 
Discord: https://fcld.ly/eldenring_discord
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eldenring
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ELDENRING 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ELDENRINGOFFICIAL
